page.title: 06Jackfield Tileworks
page.content: Craven Dunhill tileworks museum has a collection of{8000 tiles}and {12000 tile patterns.}It also has a collection of hospital panels out of the childrens wards.The pictures on the panels are mainly of nursery rhyme characters. Most of the tiles in the museum were made locally but some came from other areas. The average number of people who visit the museum each week is approximately 700, but this is increasing all the time. Most of the visitors already have an interest in tiles. There are many foreign visitors particularly Americans. {Maws tileworks}still stands on the river bank, it closed as a tileworks in 1969,it is now a Craft centre.
